attributes.action: pressure the BBC for the creation of a Neighbours omnibus.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Lesser soaps have for years enjoyed an omnibus. It's time Neighbours, the greatest of the soaps, had one.

Missing Neighbours is a horrible thing and it's the poor, who cannot afford equipment to reliably record Neighbours, who suffer most.

The quality of life of thousands of hard working Britains could be improved by the provision of a weekend omnibus.

Campaigns for an omnibus have long been ignored, so we ask the PM to lend his weight, to apply pressure to the BBC and to make our dream a reality!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
